MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 05:55PM to safely carry out further investigation works on out network after reports of flickering lights and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25 PM on Tuesday, 30 March 2021.
